name: SuperGrind RPG
description:
This game was heavily inspired by Firestone Idle RPG, Swag and Sorcery, Weapon Shop Fantasy, Pixel ShopKeeper and a couple others.

SuperGrind RPG is a classic RPG game, It includes stats allocation, dungeoning, leveing, gearing, talents and a few other mechanisms...
SuperGrindRPG follows the same formula of Swag and Sorcery... All battles are resolved automatically, all you do is the character upgrades
such as weapons talents and stats.

Does SuperGrind RPG have a deep lore?
Answer: No it doesnt it focus on mechanics.

Will I be able to cast spells or use different skills as a Mage or Ranger?
Answer: No, but these classes have theyr
own stats so you need to play them differently.

Whats the purpose of this game?
Answer: It`s just a game to play and relax.... cute graphics, cute music,
progression with low effort.

Is this game Hard?
Answer: No... It can be repeatable, It`s a grinding game.

Features


  • Leveling
  • Stats Allocation
  • Gearing
  • Wars
  • Talents
  • Gem Traders
  • Hell Dimension
  • Resurrection

Gatekeeper:

Teleports you to the dungeons.

Squire:

Carries your equipments.
